ovdesc.p: This table holds a copy of any XSLT transformation held on the matching record in the table IF.INTEGRATION.FLOW.CATALOG.

desc.p: This field holds the unique name which identifies this Integration Flow. This name has two components where the first part represents the name of the Integration Studio project and the second part which is used as the name of the flow when created from Integration Studio.
This field holds a copy of any XSLT transformation held on the matching record in the table IF.INTEGRATION.FLOW.CATALOG.
